a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: The female employment- to-population ratio corresponds to the proportion of a country's female population 15+ that is
employed. All figures correspond to 'modeled ILO estimates' (see source for details).
Data source: International Labour Organization (via World Bank)
